mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SIGN(DOC_NO, DOC_TITLE, MEMBER_ID, WRITER_NAME, DOC_CONTENT, FILE_NAME, ORI_NAME) VALUES (SIGN_SEQ.nextval, #{docTitle}, #{memberId}, #{writerName}, #{docContent}, #{fileName}, #{oriName})
mapper.select: SELECT DOC_NO, DOC_TITLE, MEMBER_ID, INSERT_DATE, SIGN_DATE, DOC_STATUS, DOC_CONTENT, FILE_NAME, ORI_NAME, USER_READ, BOSS_READ, WRITER_NAME FROM SIGN WHERE DOC_NO = #{docNo}
